CustomField.description: Used to define the milestone sort order for the gantt chart.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
When Defining the sort order please input a coma separated value list using field API names. You may also define ascending or descending order by including ASC/DESC.
For example: Kickoff__c ASC, Deadline__c ASC, Name ASC
The above example will
CustomField.label: Custom Milestone Sort Order
